title: Fully renovated, washer and dryer in unit , spacious studio
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to NoHo Centre', 'NoHo Centre offers convenience and luxury in the heart of Valley Village.', "You'll find spacious one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with washers and dryers, conveniently located just minutes from the 170 and 101 freeways, as well as shopping, restaurants, entertainment and award-winning local schools.", 'Our apartment homes are comfortable, spacious and luxuriously appointed with all the modern amenities.', 'We are pet friendly, offer spacious outdoor nooks that expand your living space, and provide tons of on-site amenities.', 'The perfect place to call home, NoHo Centre gives you a place to nest in beautiful, exciting Los Angeles.', 'CONTACT US TODAY AND SEE WHAT SETS US APART!Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798', '-Central AC and heat', '-Courtyard', '-Hardwood Floors', '-Laundry Facilities', '-Cable Ready', '-Dishwasher', '-Refrigerator', '-Elevator', '-Garage', '-Public Transportation', '-Controlled Access/Gated', '-Electric Range', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
